entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm.
